abstract: Although Microsoft has locked up banner ad space on the site, companies like AdBrite still see opportunities in other areas of Facebook.
snippet: Although Microsoft has locked up banner ad space on the site, companies like AdBrite still see opportunities in other areas of Facebook.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft nabbed much of the banner ad space on Facebook last week, but pockets of the site remain out of the technology giant’s hands – for now. (Release on the deal here.)

headline.main: The Back Door Into Facebook Ads
